item.title: About
item.description: I’m a first year PhD student in Computer Graphics at the University of Toronto, advised by Prof. Eitan Grinspun. I love visual storytelling, and a huge component of that is the world-building required that breathes life into these stories. My research lies at the intersection of physics-based animation and control. I’m particularly interested in not only investigating good computational models for natural phenomena, but also
